content: the pasvik neckwarmer is a perfect leftover-project for beginners it s worked in the round on a circular needle and you only need to know how to knit and purl it s shaped as a tube and you can adjust the height as you desire good luck **height** 20 cm 7 8 inches **width** 24 cm 9 4 inches **gauge** 15 sts on needle 6 mm us 10 = 10 cm **needle** circular needle 6 mm us 10 40 cm **yarn** 50 g kos by sandnes garn 50 g børstet alpakka by sandnes garn the blue pasvik neckwarmer is knitted in **6053** kos and **6044** børstet alpakka and the pink one is knitted in **1014** kos and **4602** børstet alpakka ** join sisu knitwear s fan club 2 ** 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/sisu-knitwear-designs
